payment.title: Total Payment
payment.tnc: By clicking "pay", you are agreeing to our terms and conditions, privacy policy and tournament rules

Sign up at: {{url}}

invitee.subtitle: Here's a rewards for using referral link.

noData.btnCont: to select one that appeals to you.

blocked.title: Your account has been Blocked.
blocked.desc: We’ve detected unusual activity on your account and have blocked your account as a security precaution.

archived.title: Your account has been Archived.

unusual.title: Unusual Activity!
unusual.desc: We noticed unusual activity in your GameBox account and have logged you out.

blocked_user_modal.support: For more information, please contact support at

automated_entry_modal.instruction_subtitle:
Participate in any tournament throughout the platform before the timer runs out.
Tickets won from the tournaments will automatically be added into the Daily Draw pool. It’s that easy.
automated_entry_modal.instruction_tip: Tip: Earn more tickets by “spent gems” to increase your ticket count.

notification.title: Notifications
notification.no_notification_desc: Looks like you've not played for any prizes yet.

guide.subtitle: Follow this guide to connect your metamask wallet on your mobile.
guide.step_4: Sign in to your metamask account
guide.step_5: Select your wallet network by tapping on the "Wallet" at the top
guide.mobile_guide: Guide to connect to wallet on mobile

invalid_wallet.title: Invalid Wallet
invalid_wallet.desc_1: Your Froyo Games account was previously bound to another wallet address. Please use the same wallet address when connecting.
invalid_wallet.desc_2: If you are using Metamask and are frequently encountering this error, please try the following steps:
invalid_wallet.step_1: Disconnect all accounts on Metamask (click the <1>"Connected"</1> button on the top left of the Metamask wallet)
invalid_wallet.step_2: Select the correct account when connecting to Metamask
invalid_wallet.step_3: To unbind this wallet from your Froyo Games Account, please <1>click here</1> to contact support

bind_wallet_guide.subtitle: Your Froyo Account is not currently bound to a wallet. Please follow these simple steps to successfully connect your wallet to Gamebox.
bind_wallet_guide.step_1: Please log in to your account on <1>{{url}}</1>
bind_wallet_guide.step_2: Ensure you have the Metamask browser extension installed and set up. You can also use any WalletConnect-compatible wallet.
bind_wallet_guide.step_3: Bind your wallet to your Froyo Games account by signing a message with your wallet.
bind_wallet_guide.step_4: Once successfully bound, your wallet should be connected to your account when accessing the Gamebox platform.

noWallet.title: Wallet not connected.
noWallet.subTitle: Please connect your wallet to continue.

insufficentToken.title: Insufficient Froyo Tokens.
insufficentToken.subTitle: Please purchase Froyo Tokens to continue.

isFail.title: Purchase unsuccessful.
isFail.subTitle: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

processFail.title: Error
processFail.subTitle: Unable to update payment to server. Please try again

sorry.title: SORRY
sorry.subtitle: GameBox is not available in your country yet.

additionalTicket.title: Increase your tickets earnings
additionalTicket.ads: You have chosen to watch ads to boost your ticket earnings
additionalTicket.gems: You have chosen to use gems to boost your ticket earnings

register.title: How to register
register.subtitle: Here’s a simple guide for you on how to register with us.

step_1.title: Register with www.froyo.games
step_1.desc: Head over to <1>froyo.games/registration</1> and create an account.

step_2.title: Verify your email address
step_2.desc: Verify your email address once your account has been created.

step_3.title: Return to GameBox to login
step_3.desc: Close all tabs and return to <1>froyo.games/gamebox</1> to continue with your login.

hero_content.title: Discover, Explore, and Collect NFTs!
hero_content.subtitle: Discover a wide selection of available NFTs. Now is your chance to explore and collect them while they are still available.

how_it_works.title: HOW DOES IT WORK?
how_it_works.subtitle: Simply follow these three simple steps.

step_1.title: Discover NFTs
step_1.desc: A diverse set of NFTs is waiting to be discovered.

step_2.title: Compete in tournaments
step_2.desc: Compete against players from around the world to see who can get the highest score.

step_3.title: Win NFTs
step_3.desc: Collect tickets to be eligible to win an NFT of your choice.

daily_rewards.title: That's not all!
daily_rewards.subtitle: Every week, you will receive FREE NFTs.
daily_rewards.desc_2: You will automatically receive tickets for weekly NFT rewards when you win any tournament!

howTo.title: How to win tickets for the Bonus Draw?
howTo.1: Participate in any tournament throughout the platform before the timer runs out. Tickets won from the tournaments will automatically be added into the Daily Draw pool. It’s that easy.
howTo.2: Tip: Earn more tickets by "use gems" to increase your ticket count.

spinner.claim: Claim your daily free gems here!

tournament.title: JOIN TOURNAMENTS!
tournament.subtitle: Compete against other players, collect tickets, and you could win this Prize!

subtitle.1: Unable to submit score to the server.
subtitle.2: Skip: Gems will not be refunded and score will not be recorded

stayTuned.title: Stay Tuned!
stayTuned.subtitle1: We'll be back with more rewards for you.
stayTuned.subtitle2: Here're some games for you while you wait.

VIPPass.name: VIP Pass
VIPPass.title: GAMEBOX VIP PASS
VIPPass.subtitle: The Gamebox VIP Pass is a privilege membership pass in Gamebox.
VIPPass.desc: The Gamebox VIP Pass NFT grants players special utilities, such as increased daily spins and future utilities. This gives players additional free gems daily to participate and win prizes on Gamebox.

brokenLink.title: Error
brokenLink.message_2: Please contact support for further assistance.

logGEnterFail.title: Error
logGEnterFail.message_2: Please check your internet connection and try again.

internetError.title: Error
internetError.message_1: Game failed to load. Please check your internet connection and try again.
internetError.message_2: Skip: Gems will not be refunded

noData.title: No notifications found yet!
noData.subtitle: Looks like you've not played for any prizes yet.
noData.cta: <0>Click here</0> to look for one you like.

warning.title: Players who attempt to cheat or utilise exploits that can impact gameplay may be banned.
warning.subtitle: This website is reCAPTCHA-protected, and the Google <1>Privacy Policy</1> and <3>Terms of Service</3> apply.

additionalBenefit.ticketExp: Additional tickets and experience points earned

prize.title: HOW TO WIN PRIZES?
prize.subtitle: Follow these 4 simple steps.
prize.1: Select the prize you would like to win.
prize.3: Win and earn tickets at the end of tournament.
prize.4: Enter new tournaments to collect more tickets.

footer.tip: Pro tip: The more tickets you have, the higher chance to win the prize.
footer.title: How it works?
footer.subtitle1: When the total amount of tickets (global tickets) reaches the allocated number, your tickets (along with other players' tickets) will enter a pool. The winner will be chosen based on the ticket drawn from the pool randomly.
footer.subtitle2: If a prize enter's overtime, players can still participate in tournaments and win tickets. Consider it as a bonus hour to earn more tickets before the prize ends.

quitModal.title: QUIT GAME?
quitModal.subtitle: You will lose your current game score if you exit now and <1>Gems will not be refunded</1>.

insufficientGems.title: INSUFFICIENT GEMS
insufficientGems.subtitle: You are out of gems. Please purchase more gems to continue.

noAds.title: No Ads are available at the moment!
noAds.subtitle: You are still able to get additional tickets.

ads.title: Confirm watch ads?
ads.subtitle: You will get the additional tickets immediately after every game.

nftNotMinted.text: This NFT is not minted yet. We'll notify you once it's out.

gemsConfirm.title: Confirm use {{count}} gems?
gemsConfirm.subtitle: You will get the additional tickets immediately after every game.

subscription.title: Out of Gems?
subscription.subtitle: It appears that you don't have enough Gems. Gems can be used to join tournaments and earn additional tickets.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: This Privacy Policy informs you of our policies and procedures regarding the collection, use and disclosure of personal information we receive from users. This Privacy Policy applies to GameBox’s games, websites and related services, which we here collectively call the Service. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on the primary access points to our games service which may be updated from time to time. You are advised to consult this policy regularly for any changes

content.1: While using our services, you may provide us with personally identifiable information. This refers to information about you that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Information"). Personal information includes, but is not limited to, your name and email address. We primarily use your Personal Information to provide our services and respond to your inquiries.
content.2: We primarily use your Personal Information (in some cases in conjunction with your Non-Identifying Information) to provide our games services, complete your transactions, and administer your inquiries.

dataProvidedByYou.title: Data provided by you
dataProvidedByYou.subtitle: This is data provided by you and generated for you when using our Service

content.1: Contact Information (such as but not limited to name, email address. etc)

dataCollectedAutomatically.title: Data collected automatically
dataCollectedAutomatically.subtitle: This is data that is collected when using certain features in our service

content.5: Data regarding your use of the Service, such as gameplay data and your interactions with other players within the Service

content.1: Data obtained through a link with a third-party tool provided by a service (such as but not limited to Facebook, Google Play Game Service or Game Centre)
content.2: Demographic data (such as to determine the coarse location of your IP address)
content.4: Data for platforms that the games run on (payment verification etc.)
content.5: Data for advertising and analytics purposes

whyIsDataCollected.title: Why is this data collected?
whyIsDataCollected.subtitle: The data collected helps us provide our service including:

content.1: Create accounts that allow you to save your progress and use our applications
content.4: Provide and deliver products and services you request

improve.title: To improve our service to our players, we have implemented the following measures:

content.2: Provide social services within our service
content.4: Better respond to issues and provide better support
content.5: Provide offers in the service, or by other websites, services and email
content.6: Share related information such as updates, alerts and support

ads.title: To display personalised advertisements within the game as well as other websites and services by:

content.1: Track content you access in the application and your online behaviour
content.2: Deliver, target and improve our advertising and our applications

services.title: We keep our Service safe and fair:
services.subtitle: In order to keep our services and their social features safe and fair, prevent fraud and ensure acceptable use, we have an interest in processing the necessary data to:

content.1: Analyse and monitor the use of our service and social interactions
content.2: Moderate communications both automatically or manually
content.3: Take action against players committing fraud or abuse

dataRetention.title: Data Retention Policy Managing Your Data
dataRetention.subtitle: All User-Provided data will be retained as long as you are using our service and for a reasonable amount of time thereafter. Collected information will be retained for up to 24 months and it may be stored in aggregate after the duration. If you’d like us to delete User Provided Data that you have provided via the Service, please contact us at <1>Froyo Games</1>. Please note that some or all of the User-Provided Data may be required in order for our Service to function properly.

children.title: Children
children.subtitle: We do not knowingly collect, market, or solicit personal data about anyone under the age of 13, nor do we knowingly allow such individuals to use our Services. If you are under the age of 13, please do not send us any information about yourself, such as your name, address, phone number, or email address. Anyone under the age of 13 is not permitted to provide any personal information. If a parent or guardian discovers that his or her child has given us information without their permission, please contact us at <1>Froyo Games</1>. We will remove such information within a reasonable time.

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: We are concerned about safeguarding the confidentiality of your information. We provide physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards to protect the information we process and maintain. For example, we limit access to this information to authorised employees and contractors who need to know that information in order to operate, develop or improve our Service. Please be aware that, although we endeavour to provide reasonable security for information we process and maintain, no security system can prevent all potential security breaches.

consent.title: Your Consent
consent.subtitle: By using our Service, you are consenting to our processing of your information as set forth in this Privacy Policy now and as amended by us. “Processing,” means using cookies on a computer/handheld device or using or touching information in any way, including, but not limited to, collecting, storing, deleting, using, combining and disclosing information.

contact.title: Contacting Us
contact.subtitle: If you have any questions regarding our privacy policy or our practices, please contact us at <1>Froyo Games</1>.

tnc.title: Terms & Conditions
tnc.subtitle1: We provide a fun space for you to play games with your friends and others across the world. We need your help to keep it an environment that is safe and fun for you.
tnc.subtitle2: These rules apply to all interactions with others both within the game and in our respective communities, services and environments. These standards act as a guide to how you should interact within our ecosystems, including but not limited to the examples below.
tnc.subtitle3: Violation of these rules could result in actions taken against your account including a permanent ban.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.subtitle: We encourage you to never share your personal information. The sharing of personal information of others aside from display names and player IDs are not allowed across all our games and our various social ecosystems.

bully.title: Bullying and Harassment
bully.subtitle: We believe that respect is the basis of a good community – when chatting, playing or creating user names/guild names, any behavior that is predatory, threatening, intimidating, lewd, demeaning, derogatory, invasive of privacy, or abusive will not be tolerated

impersonation.title: Impersonating Others
impersonation.subtitle: Don't impersonate or claim to be others, whether its users, celebrities, or officials, streamers, GameBox staff or anyone else. Don't post the work of others and pose it as your own! This would be considered stealing and could lead to severe consequences

cheating.title: Cheating and Abuse
cheating.subtitle: Fair play goes a long way to ensure a satisfying experience. Any discussions or attempts to cheat or exploit bugs and glitches that impact the game could lead to potential banning. If you find any exploits, we would be grateful if you could report it to us!

diversity.title: Diversity
diversity.subtitle: We encourage social interactions between people of all walks of life. Do not marginalize, demean or discriminate against other users or groups.

illegal.title: Illegal Activities
illegal.subtitle: Discussions of or active Illegal and dangerous activities including but not limited to gambling, drug use, phishing etc is not allowed. Respect local laws and do report to us if you find others in the community discussing or participating in these illegal activities.

consequences.title: Consequences
consequences.subtitle1: Violations of any of these rules will be reviewed on an individual basis, and appropriate action will be taken if necessary. Repeat offenses and severity will be considered before bans or other measures are taken against the respective accounts on each game.
consequences.subtitle2: Accounts that have been banned may lose access to the game account, items, digital currencies, and other items earned or purchased.
consequences.subtitle3: Supporting one another will result in more fun, joy, and excitement, so let's work together to create a positive environment!

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Request
dataDeletion.subtitle: If you would like us to delete User Provided Data that you have provided through the Service, please contact us at <1>Froyo Games</1>. Please keep in mind that some or all of the User Provided Data may be required for our Service to function properly.
